data.oai_dc:dc: Position of all loci used in the present study on the (female) genetic map of Atlantic salmon. Distance units for the locations are in centimorgan, 'lg' refers to linkage groups and the 'totalPos' column refers to distance from the beginning of lg 1. Other distances are for each linkage group separately.
Conservation Genetics|Ecological Genetics|Fisheries Management|Genomics/Proteomics|Population Genetics - Empirical
